law.catch_line: Construction of statutes relating to block grants.

text.section: If any other section of KRS 45.351 to 45.358 is declared unconstitutional, any other statute to the contrary notwithstanding, no block grant money received from the United States government shall be spent or allocated unless appropriated by the General Assembly in regular or special session.

This section shall supersede all statutes other than KRS 45.351 to 45.358 and any branch budget bills with respect to the expenditure of federal block grant funds and any statute in conflict herewith is repealed to the extent of the conflict.

law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 18, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 455, sec. 10, effective July 1, 1982.
